actions.committee: Committee on Finance for 7 days of session pursuant to section 1023 of P
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance for 7 days of session pursuant to section 1023 of P.L. 93-344.
Senate Committee on Finance discharged. Pursuant to section 1023 of Public Law 93-344.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 161.

official_title: A bill disapproving the cancellation transmitted by the President on August 11, 1997, regarding Public Law 105-33.

summary.text: Disapproves the President's cancellation (line item veto) of a provision in the Balanced Budget Act of 1997 that deems certain taxes, fees, or assessments collected by New York State from a health care provider before June 1, 1997, for which a specified waiver has been sought, to be permissible broad-based health care related taxes in compliance with Medicaid law (thus exempting such taxes, fees, or assessments from the requirement that provider-specific taxes be subtracted from the State share of Medicaid expenditures for purposes of Federal share calculation).

titles.title: A bill disapproving the cancellation transmitted by the President on August 11, 1997, regarding Public Law 105-33.
